*Stranger Studios is hiring a Content Manager* :rocket:

*To learn more, check out their listing on the job board:* <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/111863-content-manager>

set the channel topic: HELLO EVERYONE! To post a job, please start here: <https://superpath.co/jobs> All listings will be posted by our job bot and other posts will be removed (very politely). Thank you!!
